analysis:
✅ PERFORMANCE RATING: GOOD

Rogue Creamery generated $14,138.83 in email-attributed revenue from 105 orders 
over the last 7 days, with an average order value of $134.66.

KEY INSIGHTS:
• Campaigns driving strong revenue (>70%) - promotional strategy working well
• Flow automation has growth potential - currently underperforming

CHANNEL BREAKDOWN:
• Campaigns: $10,351.66 (73.2%) - Strong
• Flows: $3,787.17 (26.8%) - Optimize

ACTION ITEMS:
1. Optimize abandoned cart flow - biggest quick win for automation
2. Launch seasonal cheese pairing email series
3. Test VIP segment with exclusive artisan releases

STRATEGIC FOCUS:
Focus on automation optimization
